data.message: Can I ask why we have to move to another app for messages?

replies.message: Hi Kendall. Messenger is a much faster and better experience, things we've heard from people that they care a lot about. In fact, we've found that people get replies about 20% faster on Messenger than on Facebook. You can learn more about Messenger here: http://on.fb.me/1tbTly7. -Sarah
Messenger is not good  at all ! Can we go back to the old way .
Does it cost anything and why are they wanting my credit card no

There are some wacky things going on here.  It is clear that there is no, nada,zero value to the consumer here.  I have had their messenger app on my ipad for sometime and it's really irritating to be told ceaselessly that I need to switch to this.  There's a real lack of integration and transparency here.  And it's clear that Zuckerberg's honest motive here is to be able to start making money here by creating a revenue stream here.  Call me waiting for ello.  And I will quit fb before handing them a credit card.  FINALLY, they keep pinging me to add my telephone number for better security for me.  right.  not going to happen.
Yeah for old messenger! Have heard of Facebook screwing up home PC s and so many complaints! Who is it gonna be Facebook the people that make you the money ! No people no sponsors
I also liked it the old way yet we can do a lot more but I don't use it THAT much.... I prefer iMessage
It's horrible wit no explanation!!!' Just horrible
They spy on you on messenger using your smartphone recorder with camera....screw u fb
